verses.verse: The children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> even the whole congregation, <S%H5712><s%> came <S%H935><s%> into the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Zin <S%H6790><s%> in the first <S%H7223><s%> month: <S%H2320><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> stayed <S%H3427><s%> in Kadesh; <S%H6946><s%> and Miriam <S%H4813><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> there, <S%H6912><s%> and was buried there.
There was no water <S%H4325><s%> for the congregation: <S%H5712><s%> and they assembled <S%H6950><s%> themselves together against Moses <S%H4872><s%> and against Aaron. <S%H175><s%>

The people <S%H5971><s%> strove <S%H7378><s%> with Moses, <S%H4872><s%> and spoke, <S%H559><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "We wish that <S%H3863><s%> we had died <S%H1478><s%> when our brothers <S%H251><s%> died <S%H1478><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh! <S%H3068><s%>
Why have you brought <S%H935><s%> the assembly <S%H6951><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> into this wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> that we should die <S%H4191><s%> there, <S%H1165><s%> we and our animals?

Why have you made us to come up <S%H5927><s%> out of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> to bring <S%H935><s%> us in to this evil <S%H7451><s%> place? <S%H4725><s%> It is no place <S%H4725><s%> of seed, <S%H2233><s%> or of figs, <S%H8384><s%> or of vines, <S%H1612><s%> or of pomegranates; <S%H7416><s%> neither is there any water <S%H4325><s%> to drink. <S%H8354><s%>"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> went <S%H935><s%> from the presence <S%H6440><s%> of the assembly <S%H6951><s%> to the door <S%H6607><s%> of the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting, <S%H4150><s%> and fell <S%H5307><s%> on their faces: <S%H6440><s%> and the glory <S%H3519><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> appeared to them. <S%H7200><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Take <S%H3947><s%> the rod, <S%H4294><s%> and assemble <S%H6950><s%> the congregation, <S%H5712><s%> you, <S%H175><s%> and Aaron your brother, <S%H251><s%> and speak <S%H1696><s%> to the rock <S%H5553><s%> before their eyes, <S%H5869><s%> that it give forth <S%H5414><s%> its water; <S%H4325><s%> and you shall bring forth <S%H5414><s%> to them water <S%H4325><s%> out <S%H3318><s%> of the rock; <S%H5553><s%> so you shall give <S%H8248><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> and their livestock drink. <S%H8248><s%>"
Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the rod <S%H4294><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> as he commanded him. <S%H6680><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> gathered <S%H6950><s%> the assembly <S%H6951><s%> together before <S%H6440><s%> the rock, <S%H5553><s%> and he said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H8085><s%> "Hear now, <S%H4784><s%> you rebels; shall we bring <S%H3318><s%> you water <S%H4325><s%> out of this rock for you? <S%H5553><s%>"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> lifted up <S%H7311><s%> his hand, <S%H3027><s%> and struck <S%H5221><s%> the rock <S%H5553><s%> with his rod <S%H4294><s%> twice: <S%H6471><s%> and water <S%H4325><s%> came forth <S%H3318><s%> abundantly, <S%H7227><s%> and the congregation <S%H5712><s%> drank, <S%H8354><s%> and their livestock. <S%H1165><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron, <S%H175><s%> "Because you didn't <S%H539><s%> believe in me, <S%H6942><s%> to sanctify me in the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> therefore you shall not bring <S%H935><s%> this assembly <S%H6951><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> which I have given them. <S%H5414><s%>"

These are <S%H1992><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Meribah; <S%H4809><s%> because the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> strove <S%H7378><s%> with Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and he was sanctified in them. <S%H6942><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> from Kadesh <S%H6946><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> of Edom, <S%H123><s%> saying: <S%H559><s%> "Thus says your brother <S%H251><s%> Israel: <S%H3478><s%> You know <S%H3045><s%> all the travail <S%H8513><s%> that has happened to us: <S%H4672><s%>

how our fathers <S%H1><s%> went down <S%H3381><s%> into Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and we lived <S%H3427><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%> a long <S%H7227><s%> time; <S%H3117><s%> and the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> dealt ill <S%H7489><s%> with us, <S%H1><s%> and our fathers:

and when we cried <S%H6817><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> he heard <S%H8085><s%> our voice, <S%H6963><s%> and sent <S%H7971><s%> an angel, <S%H4397><s%> and brought us forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt: <S%H4714><s%> and behold, <S%H6946><s%> we are in Kadesh, a city <S%H5892><s%> in the uttermost <S%H7097><s%> of your border. <S%H1366><s%>

"Please let us pass <S%H5674><s%> through your land: <S%H776><s%> we will not pass <S%H5674><s%> through field <S%H7704><s%> or through vineyard, <S%H3754><s%> neither will we drink <S%H8354><s%> of the water <S%H4325><s%> of the wells: <S%H875><s%> we will go <S%H3212><s%> along the king <S%H4428><s%>'s highway; <S%H1870><s%> we will not turn <S%H5186><s%> aside to the right hand <S%H3225><s%> nor to the left, <S%H8040><s%> until we have passed <S%H5674><s%> your border. <S%H1366><s%>"
Edom <S%H123><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H5674><s%> "You shall not pass through me, <S%H3318><s%> lest I come out with the sword <S%H2719><s%> against you. <S%H7125><s%>"

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H5927><s%> "We will go up by the highway; <S%H4546><s%> and if we drink <S%H8354><s%> of your water, <S%H4325><s%> I and my livestock, <S%H4735><s%> then will I give <S%H5414><s%> its price: <S%H1697><s%> let me only, without doing anything else, <S%H5674><s%> pass through on my feet. <S%H7272><s%>"

He said, <S%H559><s%> "You shall not pass through. <S%H5674><s%>" Edom <S%H123><s%> came out <S%H3318><s%> against <S%H7125><s%> him with many <S%H3515><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> and with a strong <S%H2389><s%> hand. <S%H3027><s%>

Thus Edom <S%H123><s%> refused <S%H3985><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> passage <S%H5674><s%> through his border, <S%H1366><s%> so Israel <S%H3478><s%> turned away from him. <S%H5186><s%>

They traveled <S%H5265><s%> from Kadesh: <S%H6946><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> even the whole congregation, <S%H5712><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to Mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor. <S%H2023><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> in Mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor, <S%H2023><s%> by the border <S%H1366><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Edom, <S%H123><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Aaron <S%H175><s%> shall be gathered <S%H622><s%> to his people; <S%H5971><s%> for he shall not enter <S%H935><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> which I have given <S%H5414><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> because you rebelled against <S%H4784><s%> my word <S%H6310><s%> at the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Meribah. <S%H4809><s%>
Take <S%H3947><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and Eleazar <S%H499><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> and bring them up <S%H5927><s%> to Mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor; <S%H2023><s%>

and strip <S%H6584><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> of his garments, <S%H899><s%> and put <S%H3847><s%> them on Eleazar <S%H499><s%> his son: <S%H1121><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> shall be taken, <S%H622><s%> and shall die there. <S%H4191><s%>"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded: <S%H6680><s%> and they went up <S%H5927><s%> into Mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor <S%H2023><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of all the congregation. <S%H5712><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> stripped <S%H6584><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> of his garments, <S%H899><s%> and put <S%H3847><s%> them on Eleazar <S%H499><s%> his son; <S%H1121><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> there on the top <S%H7218><s%> of the mountain: <S%H2022><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Eleazar <S%H499><s%> came down <S%H3381><s%> from the mountain. <S%H2022><s%>

When all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that Aaron <S%H175><s%> was dead, <S%H1478><s%> they wept <S%H1058><s%> for Aaron <S%H175><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> even all the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
